column5: twas a LONG time awaited.  saturday. hit the lake with steph ( girlfriend) / gdc's dream    in the corner of my eye a speck jumps.  i flip a jig head tipped with a gulp mistertwister bang he takes it!      2 houres go by and nothing to prove....  2 litle minnows on the bottom of the boat are trying to tell me something.    MIMIC ME please.  i do so and i get rewarded.        Le grand pic du nord caught my attention .    a couple of turtles catching some RAYZZZZ.      4-5 rounds of the lake and had to call it a day.  super was calling my name!    best fish n chips ON THE MARKET!
Awesome stuff as usual, keep it up
Fantastic report Kevin....you certainly know where they are! Great wildlife pics too!
Right on!!  Little beauties on a sweet little lake..  How'd you get that close to the turtle without spooking him?!
Nice going!  There's nothing better than early spring brookies on a pristine little lake like that.
You always make me jealous lol! Awesome report and great pics!
Congrats!  Looks like you had a fantastic day out on the water.
well sometimes there spooked easy.  but this time for some unknown reason.  they let me come close.  they just loved the sun 2 much to go back in the cold water.
Dynamite specks! Great photos all around!  TDunn

Nice Fish,  This time of year gets my blood flowing, I'm totaly excited for my trip this week. I find the weedless Black jigs work really well for opener as well, its one of my go to lures when the Spinner bit is down.  Cheers,
Think I just drooled!!!!!!!  Beautiful brookies!!!
FINALY someone that dosent think im stupid for using them!
Very nice brookies!
Great report and pics Kevin Congrats to you and Stephanie.... beauties

LOL...my crew thought I was crazy until I started catching, while they watched My thoughts were it was small, and brownish black...like a leetch, perhaps even a stone fly, or Dragan fly nymph which is what their bellys are full of. Seems logical to me  And you just proved they work again, so there
even replicates salamanders.  there full of those also.  black colored lures is a number one lure for trout hands down.  thank you for 2nd me on this one!
Pretty fish Kevin!If your girl friend likes fishing Marry her!!!!!!!!!
Wow .. pretty specks ! Thanks for sharing ... I still have two weeks to wait before I get mine
she loves to get tanned.... read..... enjoi getting outside... and fishing..   she just likes being in the boat with me!   yes... your right i should marry her.

that might piss off his mistress...just kidding ....looks like the two of you had a good time and i enjoy seeing the adventures you two have together regardless of the season...you are a lucky man to share it with your best friend....so man up and marry the girl already!!!!
marige is way to expensive.  ill buy her a bassboat instead.  this way we will be both happy.......
ugh you K-Beck'ers are drivin me insane with jealousy !
Great job man, congrads.  MTBF
